entry.title: Tuesday night: A few wet flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few wet flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
